channel.title: Original-Dream PK HD & LD~ Project 508 By Originalpker [UPDATE 2]
channel.description:
Hello All! I've made a start on my 508 Server Project. :P
Here it is! ~ [shadow=red,left][b]Original-Dream PK Server! [508] By Originalpker[/b][/shadow] I've fixed - [color=black] *Npc Noclipping~ They can no longer go through objects/players or other Npc's!
*Specials~ Include- Dragon Daggers, Battleaxe, Longsword, Scimitar, 2Hander, BarrelChest Anchor, All Godswords, Magic and Dark bow.
*Banking~It said 23 out of around 500 and it didn't move when the items where put in, fixed it, now it says the correct amount of items in the Bank. Also Noting and Unnoting Works, Notes are also Stackable now.
*Npc Dialouge~ I found out some Npc Dialouges for example 9850 means the Npc Speaking is Happy or 9827 Meaning Serious! :P This Helps :)
*Welcome Screen~ May not seem like much, however i added a welcome screen! :)
*Wilderness~ All the levels work, with the current Wilderness Interface, not shown on pictures because i used the command to teleport there Don't worry! I'll edit it in Commands.Java :P Every 8 steps is another Wilderness level.
*Pvnpc and Pvp~I've advanced on Magic, Ranged and Melee, they are not PERFECT, because we can never get them that good! They are very good in my opinion :P (Magic is now alloud on NPC's and Ranged doesn't disconnect you when you use it on Npc's. Melee is Good, Specials work on Npc's. Those on Player work fine, focus is on Npc's for now.
*HD and SD- The Server now recognises both Clients HD or SD, meaning it's legit for both!
*Player Following~ There is now NON-COMBAT and COMBAT player following - May not sound like much but it is :P
*DFS Special~ After many errors and changing things, i got it to work! :P
*Godwars~ Many of the Godwars Npc's are Agressive and they pile on you apon entering! The Pictures I'll post will show you!
*Grand Exchange~ No Clue at the Moment Sorry :(
*Trading~ Getting there, i've got 70% Done, i needed the frames, however my friend has them and i'll soon show you 100% :)
*Autocast~ AutoCast now works, many staffs and for many combat spells. (Not perfect) Need to make the timer slower.
*Jad~ Uses real attacks, (meteor and lightning, along with melee) The Prayer needs to change to avoid damage :P
*Prayer~ Almost Reasonable, Many Prayers work, Piety increases Strength, Attack and Defence Bonuses. Protection Prayers on Npc's block out the damage depending on Combat Style. Protection Prayers on Players block out 50% of damage, not all!
*Special Bonuses~ Special Bonuses work! Example- Armadyl Godsword- 25% Strength bonus when you use the special. Dark Bow- Hit higher with Dragon Arrows(11212) then normal arrows.
*Summoning~ Started, however only around 1/3 of the Summoning Npc's actually work. They follow perfectly and give some effects! (Bunyip heals 20hp everytime you feed it raw fish) ~ Needs more work! :P
*Skills~ Many have been started, however many need work, all of the skills are trainable, however only 20% of the skill is done. Just the bases edited...:P
*Dueling~ Great, if you want a fun fight, not great for staking, working on that now :) The interface is working fine. It shows the items you're wearing and accept or decline buttons. Dueling is good, need to get the arrow headicon.
*Clan Wars~ Haven't started, all there is is go in and fight, you do however lose your items. Need to begin on that.
*Castle Wars~ Done the combat things, stairs and flag stealing...Catapault doesn't work, neither do explosives or barricades. Bandages do :P Need to progress on that.[/color]
Please Don't Flame, i hate it as much as you :( This is my first ever Topic i've started :P
Godwars and Some PvP Pictures~
Here we go! :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Godwars.jpg[/img]
Godwars - Example of Aviansies
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Npcspile.jpg[/img]
Godwars - Boss Armadyl, Npc's Pile!
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Bandos.jpg[/img]
Godwars - Boss Bandos, Haha Npc's Finally Move! :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Zamorak.jpg[/img]
Godwars - Boss Zamorak, Biggy! :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Saradomin.jpg[/img]
Godwars - Saradomin, Sorry i died... :( (Sorry about the Boss Noclipping on her Follower, Need to fix that!)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/ItemsLost.jpg[/img]
Death - You actually lose your items! :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Privatechat.jpg[/img]
Private Chat works! :)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Itemsdropped.jpg[/img]
Items dropped on Death again!
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/itemsdroppedondeath.jpg[/img]
If the Player Kills, they get the Drop! :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Skullsandtargets.jpg[/img]
Bountyhunter, Sorry about targets, had nobody to play with! :)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Autocast.jpg[/img]
Autocasting! (It's meant to be Ice Blitz)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Specialsmuch.jpg[/img]
Specials Work! (You probably knew that already :o)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/CorrectWildernesslevels.jpg[/img]
Wilderness Levels - I just spawned that Npc for fun :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/CurrectRunemotes.jpg[/img]
Correct Run Emotes for most weapons.
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Level138now.jpg[/img]
No more lv126, Glitch is fixed, lv138 :)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/NpcDialouges.jpg[/img]
Example of Npc Speaking.
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Thieving.jpg[/img]
It's a start on showing some skills :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Barrage.jpg[/img]
Barrage!
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/CurrectRunemotes.jpg[/img]
Working Dharoks.
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Vengeancekills.jpg[/img]
Vengeance can KO :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/DroppedOnVengeance.jpg[/img]
Proof :)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Vengeanceother.jpg[/img]
Vengeance Other..:P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/Lunarspellexample.jpg[/img]
A Lunar Spell Example.
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/JadMage.jpg[/img]
I know Jad isn't in the right place, i spawned him there :P
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/JadLightning.jpg[/img]
Jad, cannot move, he's stuck in the Wilderness Ditch (Npc NoClip is no more)
[IMG]http://i595.photobucket.com/albums/tt31/originalpker/NoMoreNpclip.jpg[/img]
Another Npc Noclip Example.
[color=orange]I'll add more pictures later, i will keep you up to date! I may release or whatever, i just want to see what you think :)
As i said before please don't flame, say nasty comments or such likes. I don't mind getting advice, in a polite way, i did try my hardest and still am! :o[/color]
~OriginalPker~
Also, i've been working on my 525, it's coming along nicely, soon told about, :) It has Player Rendering! :P Not started on 530 yet. 508 is still going on! :) - Yes, i know i should only do 1~ Doing 508 First.
Credits~
Palidino76 for Source, As always :) Thanks Pali. Gods Army for some help on Npc Noclip :P Originalpker for coding :P Moparscape for the Blank 508 Source. And you for reading and or posting :P
